pkgmetadata.longdescription: A replacement of cpufrequtils that is included in the Linux kernel sources since v3.1; cpupower (formerly cpupowerutils) adds additional readouts and knobs such as monitoring of idle states, turbo states, energy/performance policy setting and other features found on newer AMD and Intel CPUs.

use.flag: Provide also a tool that can be used to benchmark kernel cpufreq subsystem
